title: Drawing, after 1980
medium: Black, red and blue marker; white crayon; graphite on white tracing paper
inscribed: In center in graphite: Stand, Extra Bold
provenance: From the collection of Dan Friedman
description: DragonOil in black and red repeated four times on sheet (TC,LC,BC,LR) The two lower logos appear to be for billboards. Blue marker applied to verso of sheet.

tombstone.epitaph:
Drawing, after 1980.
after 1980. Black, red and blue marker; white crayon; graphite on white tracing paper. Gift of Ken Friedman. 1997-19-392.
